messages.message:
I took a stab at this in an attempt to unblock myself with opentelemetry packages, unfortunately we have an issue with grpc interceptors from our legacy opentracing instrumentation :sigh: .
The opentracing grpc interceptors we currently use had their last release in 2019, and they can only support `grpcio<1.63` , allowing us to bump `protobuf` only to 4.x. :sad-pikachu:
My ginormous PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71170) for reference when we get back to this in the future after we migrate to opentelemetry
